snippet: Jets Coach Rex Ryan and the starting quarterback Mark Sanchez on Wednesday defended Tim Tebow, who has been criticized in a published report by unnamed teammates.
abstract: Ben Shpigel On Pro Football column holds that New York Jets terrible season has come to be symbolized by backup quarterback Tim Tebow, who has so far amounted to a costly distraction for the team.
lead_paragraph: Jets Coach Rex Ryan and the starting quarterback Mark Sanchez on Wednesday defended Tim Tebow, who has been criticized in a published report by unnamed teammates.

headline.seo: Jets’ Tebow Engulfed in a Whirlwind
headline.main: Jets’ Tebow Engulfed in a Whirlwind
